concept.title: Bench Crafting Restrictions
concept.shortdesc: Requirements to use the Crafting Bench.

li.p: Bench crafting can only be used with Rare or Unique identified items, but has no restriction on whether they are corrupted or not.
NOTE: The Corrupted items always require the usage of Vaal Orbs in addition to the other orbs used during the crafting process making it more expensive.

ol.li: The crafting requires a number of orbs of a given type depending on the desired outcome.
An affix can only be added to an item if it has a free slot of the corresponding type. For example, a suffix can be added to an item only if it has at least one free suffix slot.

Apart from some specific cases, Bench Crafting provides the option for only one affix to be added to the item, even if there are more affix slots available. For example, a Rare item with three suffixes can only recieve one prefix even though Rare items are allowed to have up to three.
For the Unique items, Bench Crafting only provides options for socket number, links number, or socket color change. Their affixes are immutable.
